005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.Collection;
012
013import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018public interface IGroupable extends IInstance {
019
020  int DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MIN_OCCURS = 0;
021  int DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS = 1;
022  @NonNull
023  JsonGroupAsBehavior DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR = JsonGroupAsBehavior.SINGLETON_OR_LIST;
024  @NonNull
025  XmlGroupAsBehavior DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR = XmlGroupAsBehavior.UNGROUPED;
026
027  /**
028   * Get the minimum cardinality for this associated instance. This value must be
029   * less than or equal to the maximum cardinality returned by
030   * {@link #getMaxOccurs()}.
031   *
032   * @return {@code 0} or a positive integer value
033   * @see #DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MIN_OCCURS
034   */
035  int getMinOccurs();
036
037  /**
038   * Get the maximum cardinality for this associated instance. This value must be
039   * greater than or equal to the minimum cardinality returned by
040   * {@link #getMinOccurs()}, or {@code -1} if unbounded.
041   *
042   * @return a positive integer value or {@code -1} if unbounded
043   * @see #DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS
044   */
045  int getMaxOccurs();
046
047  /**
048   * Get the name provided for grouping. An instance in Metaschema must have a
049   * group name if the instance has a cardinality greater than {@code 1}.
050   *
051   * @return the group-as name or {@code null} if no name is configured, such as
052   *         when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
053   */
054  @Nullable
055  default String getGroupAsName() {
056    // no group-as by default
057    return null;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Retrieve the XML namespace for this grouping.
062   *
063   * @return the XML namespace or {@code null} if no namespace is configured
064   */
065  @Nullable
066  default String getGroupAsXmlNamespace() {
067    return getContainingDefinition().getXmlNamespace();
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Retrieve the XML namespace for this grouping.
072   * <p>
073   * If this instance doesn't have a namespace defined, then the module's XML
074   * namespace will be used.
075   *
076   * @return the XML namespace
077   */
078  // REFACTOR: remove this method
079  // REFACTOR: consider pushing down the call for getGroupAsXmlNamespace
080  @NonNull
081  default String getEffectiveGroupAsNamespace() {
082    @Nullable
083    String namespace = getGroupAsXmlNamespace();
084    if (namespace == null) {
085      namespace = ObjectUtils.notNull(getContainingModule().getXmlNamespace().toASCIIString());
086    }
087    return namespace;
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Get the name used for the associated element wrapping a collection of
092   * elements in XML. This value is required when {@link #getXmlGroupAsBehavior()}
093   * = {@link XmlGroupAsBehavior#GROUPED}. This name will be the element name
094   * wrapping a collection of elements.
095   *
096   * @return the groupAs QName or {@code null} if no name is configured, such as
097   *         when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1.
098   */
099  // REFACTOR: rename to getXmlGroupAsQName
100  @Nullable
101  default QName getEffectiveXmlGroupAsQName() {
102    return XmlGroupAsBehavior.GROUPED.equals(getXmlGroupAsBehavior())
103        // require a group-as name in this case
104        ? new QName(getEffectiveGroupAsNamespace(), ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getGroupAsName()))
105        // no group-as name in this case
106        : null;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Gets the configured JSON group-as strategy. A JSON group-as strategy is only
111   * required when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} &gt; 1.
112   * <p>
113   * The default for this method is {@link JsonGroupAsBehavior#NONE}, since the
114   * default behavior is to have no grouping. If {@link #getMaxOccurs()} is
115   * greater than {@code 1}, then the default behavior is
116   * {@code #DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR}.
117   *
118   * @return the JSON group-as strategy, or {@code JsonGroupAsBehavior#NONE} if
119   *         {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
120   * @see #DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR
121   */
122  @NonNull
123  default JsonGroupAsBehavior getJsonGroupAsBehavior() {
124    return JsonGroupAsBehavior.NONE;
125  }
126
127  /**
128   * Gets the configured XML group-as strategy. A XML group-as strategy is only
129   * required when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} &gt; 1.
130   *
131   * @return the JSON group-as strategy, or {@code XmlGroupAsBehavior#UNGROUPED}
132   *         if {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
133   * @see #DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR
134   */
135  @NonNull
136  default XmlGroupAsBehavior getXmlGroupAsBehavior() {
137    return DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR;
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Get the item values for the provided {@code instanceValue}. An instance may
142   * be singular or many valued.
143   *
144   * @param instanceValue
145   *          the instance
146   * @return the item values or an empty collection if no item values exist
147   */
148  @NonNull
149  default Collection<?> getItemValues(@NonNull Object instanceValue) {
150    // no item values by default
151    return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
152  }
153}
